website_summaries.verdict: Combination D3 and K2 supplement supporting heart health and bone strength.
pros: Veggie capsules intent on boosting cardiovascular health, and bone growth and strength
Only need to take one or two a day
Contains no soy, GMOs, and is kosher and vegetarian friendly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known the difference between MK4 (slower to absorb) and MK7 (super absorbant). Both are K-2, but the MK4 should be a lot less expensive... I feel I overpaid for this one. Still, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bloodwork showed my D level was very low and my doctor recommended taking D3 with K2
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell a difference in how I feel since I have been taking these. My bloodwork showed my D level was very low and my doctor recommended taking D3 with K2. I find if I take more than 2 I get a headache, not sure why, but I do better with taking one in morning and one after dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Karenjs

customer_reviews.title: Only Vitamin D Supplement I purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've read that your vitamin D levels are critical to your health, and ideally achieved through safe sun exposure. Since that isn't possible where I live year round, and since I do not believe in using a tanning salon, I turned to these supplements. I wanted to ideally be at 55 ng/ml. I tried taking the recommended dosage on the bottle, but still wasn't there. I now take 5 of these per day and have achieved te 55 ng/ml. I highly recommend this product, and suggest anyone considering it to consult with their doctor to determine what dosage is right for them. Also like that it is a non-gmo product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: my bod needs the K-2 to make my doctor say I am in pretty good health
customer_reviews.text: I am 75 and at this age, you usually need to take Vit D. Women more than men, and for unknown reasons, my bod needs the K-2 to make my doctor say I am in pretty good health. Took a fall and I expected a broken arm and ribs.. didn't happen. But it was happening in the past so I am reasonably sure this was a good idea for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: They are capsule form which is nice not to big. Doctor requires that I take 5000 mg daily so tis makes it possible to split them so I can take them during the day. Thanks, Anna
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good vegetarian vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: My doctor told me i needed a little more D in my diet because my tests showed i was low. Because I'm a vegetarian, the selection for pills of all kinds are severely limited. Im glad that I found these. Now foods almost always seems to have something in a vegetarian format. They're easy to take, not offensive (smell or taste) and reasonably priced. I do with they will become available on the subscribe and save program.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I love NOW's vitamins. I have a closet full of them.
customer_reviews.author: MrsVisich

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Although I usually love NOW Foods products - this one did not work for me. I did not get a benefit from this and would not recommend to others.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering second bottle now! Started take 2000mg along with magnesium. Hair loss stopped. No more mood Swings and no longer tired.
customer_reviews.author: ed and Sondra owens

customer_reviews.title: Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Fist time taking this brand, don’t think it works as well as others. Won’t purchase again. Also I have some food allergies I feel like it made em worse. Can’t be 💯 sure but think the quality and Absorbency isn’t the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: I've been happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a variety of concerns as I get older, and I am trying to stay as active as possible. I like this brand. The pills are as easy to swallow as most other pills. There is no real unpleasant taste that I can determine, but I tend to wash down pills with a cup or so of water. I've heard this a good product to use to help keep your bones strong.
customer_reviews.author: Scott FS

customer_reviews.title: Has MK-4 instead of MK-7
customer_reviews.text: MK-4, I hear is made from industrial waste chemicals and the company describes it as " Synthetic ". Give me a break! MK-7 is generally made from real natural food like natto or chickpeas. Tha is what should have been in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin D with K2
customer_reviews.text: I like Now products, but was not happy with lanolin derived vitamin D and it did not seem to work. I wish they had a sunflower seed based D which absorbs better. If you like lanolin and have used products like this in the past you should be happy with it. I was not for the first time ever with a Now product.
customer_reviews.author: Wildroses

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain and headaches, might not be gluten free!
customer_reviews.text: I get stomach pain and a headache whenever I take this vitamin. Apparently on the bottle it says “processed in a facility that also processes ingredients with these allergens” or something along those lines. I don’t remember seeing that before I bought this. I don’t know if my symptoms are related to a reaction to gluten but either way my body can not tolerate these for some reason. I even took the vitamins right after eating so they shouldn’t be hurting my stomach this much. I recommend choosing another brand especially if you have an allergy or intolerance to any major allergen.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Great for your heart and your bones...
customer_reviews.text: The combination keeps calcium out of your veins and arteries and into your bones where it belongs. I like this product and take it in the mornings with breakfast. Then go out walking or getting some exercise to help my body absorb the vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Davirgi

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: They delivered fast and better price then retail market prices. This is for my son’s VITAMIN d-3 and k2 us good with calcium. My son told me It is easy to swallow it. And nothing bad. We like the NOW product. I trust better than no-name brand
customer_reviews.author: jihyun lyu

customer_reviews.title: Best combo vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I take this vitamin because of a deficiency of D3. The K2 helps it to better absorb and go where it needs to. I feel much better than just taking D3 alone. I recommend this vitamin and will continue to purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Good dosage combination for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by dentist to take k2. Finding a good dosage for child was surprisingly difficult. We have been happy with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand

customer_reviews.title: As described

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of vitamins.

customer_reviews.text: Love the combination, both work together and are highly needed by our body. Unless you live near the equator, your are probably vitamin D deficient .

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin D-3 and K-2
customer_reviews.text: I previously used K2 and D3 separately and while the K2 came in a smooth Gel cap that was easy to swallow, the D3 came in tablet form. The tablet was wide, long, and flat. The edges were all sharp and 90 degrees. This shape made it VERY hard to swallow. The Now foods Vitamin D-3 and K-2 is in a smooth capsule shape and is VERY easy to swallow. Also now I only need to take a single capsule instead of both a Gel cap "and" a tablet. I am pleased.

customer_reviews.text: Depending on where you live, or maybe because you slather yourself in sunscreen everyday, many people suffer from Vitamin D deficiency, that's what happened to me. So, I'm faithful to my daily doses and it really does help. I definitely trust the NOW Foods brand.

customer_reviews.title: Seems just fine
customer_reviews.text: I guess the jury is out on the actual effectiveness of this supplement combination, so without any real science it is hard to rate the product efficacy. The product itself seems of fine quality and we have seen no ill side effects after months of use. Until we get some bone density measurements, we can't comment further. But that is the beauty of Amazon. I can easily look up this review years later and update with the data.

customer_reviews.title: Good combo
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my husband and son because they like the convenience of having the two vitamins together. You are (supposedly) better off taking D3 and K2 together because they work in tandem. However, 45mcg of K2 is not enough for an adult man unless you are getting additional K2 from other sources, so you will either need to take three of these pills daily, or ascertain whether you are meeting your K2 needs elsewhere in your diet. Then again, I am neither a doctor or a nutritionist, so please make informed decisions based on your own research and dietary needs. I do like the NOW brand, and I've never had a problem with any of their supplements.

I did not know that it is standard practice for manufacturers to state K2 is the more expensive MK7 form when it is MK7, and not to write anything at all about how K2 is obtained (even on their website) when it is not MK7. I give it one star because I am against such practice. I have now bought another product where K2 is in MK7 form, and will be throwing this one out.

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, Vitamin D-3 & K-2, 1,000 IU/45 mcg, Plus Cardiovascular Support*, Supports Bone Health*, 120 Veg Capsules
product_meta.description:
NOW Vitamin D-3 & K-2 veggie capsules combine two nutrients extensively researched for their contribution to the health of bones, teeth, and the cardiovascular system.* Vitamin D-3 promotes calcium transport and absorption.* Recent studies indicate that Vitamin D-3 may play a role in proper insulin action and glucose metabolism and has an important function within the immune system.* Vitamin K is critical for the formation of a healthy, strong bone matrix.* Vitamin K's role in arterial health revolves around its ability to support proper calcium metabolism in vascular structures.* Vitamin K-2 is a readily active and biologically available form of Vitamin K.* Natural color variation may occur in this product.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: SUPPORTS BONE HEALTH*/PLUS CARDIOVASCULAR SUPPORT*: NOW Vitamin D-3 & K-2 veggie capsules combine two nutrients extensively researched for their contribution to the health of bones, teeth, and the cardiovascular system.*

1,000 IU/45 mcg: Recent studies indicate that Vitamin D-3 may play a role in proper insulin action and glucose metabolism and has an important function within the immune system.* Vitamin K is critical for the formation of a healthy, strong bone matrix.*

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
